key_risks: Intense competition from established players like Shopify and Salesforce Commerce Cloud
Regional revenue concentration in Latin America, exposing the company to economic and political risks
Platform complexity limiting appeal to small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs)
Dependence on third-party cloud infrastructure providers and payment processors
Data privacy compliance challenges across multiple jurisdictions
controversies: Legal dispute with Mirakl in 2021, impacting intellectual property and competitive positioning
Potential ethical concerns due to global operations in regions with varying regulatory enforcement
governance_issues: Exposure to risks of misconduct or non-compliance with local regulations in global operations
